name: GoogleDrive
description: This Test Connection validates access to Google Drive and the ability to retrieve file and directory metadata.

steps.name: CheckAccess
steps.description: Validate that we can connect to Google Drive and authenticate using the provided credentials.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to connect to Google Drive. Please verify your credentials and API access.

steps.name: GetDriveFiles
steps.description: List files and directories accessible to the authenticated user in Google Drive.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch Google Drive files. Please ensure the user has the necessary permissions to access the drive content.

steps.name: GetSpreadsheets
steps.description: List all Google Sheets accessible to the authenticated user (if Google Sheets are included).
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch Google Sheets. Please ensure the user has the necessary permissions to access the spreadsheets.
